title: Pyke Related to Illaoi??
body: I mean, I take a closer look of his weapon and the first thing that comes to my mind is The Idol she carries. Is she related to him? Maybe she's the one that  made it so that he wouldn't die, so that he could fulfill his revenge. What do you think??

replies.body: I wouldn't say that they are related. But they are aware of each other's existence.

At first I thought he's simply a Shadow isle champ, but what you said intrigued me.
If he was just a Shadow isle champ, she would just want to kill him, like all the other ones, but that wouldn't make him aware of her.
 Was he revived by another God from the Nagakabouros mythology? Or some other God that is near Bilgewater, as Swain says they are "never looking beneath"?
